detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Aviator-style sunglasses with slim frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Hat in braided paper straw with a fabric band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair decorated with plastic stones. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2 cm.
Metal necklace with shell-shaped details. Adjustable length 33-47 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in soft denim made from a linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, a gently tapered waist, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in leather with visible seams, a high waist with a visible zip at the back, and a raw-edge hem. Lined.
Jacket in a woven wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, seam under the bust, short, elbow-length sleeves. and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, seam under the bust, short, elbow-length sleeves. and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend with narrow notch lapels, and a one-button fastening at the front. Welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a button, buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
String body in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
String body in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, straight-cut coat in wool with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a detachable tie belt. Satin lining.

Short, double-breasted, padded down jacket with a large, padded collar and concealed press-stud fastenings at the front. Diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a detachable, padded tie belt at the waist. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.

Short dress in sturdy, cotton sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with a folded detail at the shoulders to create a defined silhouette. Long sleeves with shaping seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long skirt in a patterned, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a sheen. Wide, covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers to create width and movement. Shorter underskirt in a viscose weave with a high slit at one side.

Wide, long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose and silk blend with a V-neck opening and ties at the front. Pleats at the back of the neck and shoulders, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the front, a mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem with embossed text. Medium support.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Fitted jacket in a textured cotton and viscose weave with notch lapels, long sleeves, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a print motif on the fingertips.
Straight-style sweater vest in a wool knit with a V-neck, ribbed side sections, ribbing around the neckline and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Tunic in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the top and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.
Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.
Pyjama shorts in soft satin with scallop-trimmed, covered elastication at the waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Wide elasticated, ribbed waist, patch front pockets, a back pocket and straight legs.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Wide elasticated, ribbed waist, patch front pockets, a back pocket and straight legs.
Dressy leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from wool with a high, elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases, and slits at the hems.
Dressy leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from wool with a high, elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases, and slits at the hems.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flared style with longer sides. Lined.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Nightshirt in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cold shoulder top in smocked jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves with frill trims and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Cold shoulder top in smocked jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves with frill trims and a frill trim at the top and hem.

Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
